Package com.mvohm.quadruple.test

A test appliance for methods of the Quadruple class.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TesterClasses.QuadOpTester
    Common interface for all testers classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuxMethods
    A set of convenience methods to be used by other classes of the quadruple.test package.
    Consts
    Constants used by various other classes in the com.mvohm.quadruple.test package
    DataGenerators
    Auxiliary static methods that generate various collections of test data used by DataProviders
    DataGenerators.CartesianSquare
    Generates Cartesian squares of the set of operands including special values like NaN, Infinity, and -0, to form a set of operands to test binary operators on various combinations of the operands.
    DataGenerators.Randoms
    The methods of this class generate random values and various random sequences, including lists of pairs of random values suitable for testing binary operations
    DataItem
    A DataItem is a container for a value that is used or generated when testing an operation with a data sample.
    DataProviders
    A collection of static methods that build and return data sets for testing different Quadruple operations.
    QuadJUnitTests
    A set of JUnit test methods.
    QuadTest
    A stand-alone program for testing methods of the Quadruple class.
    SpecificTesterClasses
    Contains concrete descendants of the abstract tester classes defined in TesterClasses.
    SpecificTesterClasses.BdToQuadTester
    A tester class to test the conversion from BigDecimal to Quadruple, namely the Quadruple.Quadruple(BigDecimal) constructor.
    SpecificTesterClasses.DoubleToQuadTester
    A tester class to test the conversion from double to Quadruple, namely the Quadruple.Quadruple(double) constructor.
    SpecificTesterClasses.InstanceAdditionTester
    A tester class to test instance method Quadruple.add(Quadruple op).
    SpecificTesterClasses.InstanceDivisionTester
    A tester class to test instance method Quadruple.divide(Quadruple op2).
    SpecificTesterClasses.InstanceMultiplicationTester
    A tester class to test instance method Quadruple.multiply(Quadruple op2).
    SpecificTesterClasses.InstanceSqrtTester
    A tester class to test Quadruple.sqrt().
    SpecificTesterClasses.InstanceSubtractionTester
    A tester class to test instance method Quadruple.subtract(Quadruple op).
    SpecificTesterClasses.LongToQuadTester
    A tester class to test the conversion from long to Quadruple, namely the Quadruple.Quadruple(long) constructor.
    SpecificTesterClasses.QuadToBdTester
    A tester class to test Quadruple.bigDecimalValue().
    SpecificTesterClasses.QuadToBDToQuadTester
    A tester class to test the conversion from Quadruple to BigDecimal and back to Quadruple.
    SpecificTesterClasses.QuadToDoubleTester
    A tester class to test Quadruple.doubleValue().
    SpecificTesterClasses.QuadToIntTester
    A tester class to test Quadruple.intValue().
    SpecificTesterClasses.QuadToLongTester
    A tester class to test Quadruple.longValue().
    SpecificTesterClasses.QuadToStringTester
    A tester class to test Quadruple.toString().
    SpecificTesterClasses.QuadToStringToQuadTester
    A tester class to test the conversion from Quadruple to String and back to Quadruple.
    SpecificTesterClasses.StaticAdditionTester
    A tester class to test static method Quadruple.add(Quadruple op1, Quadruple op2).
    SpecificTesterClasses.StaticDivisionTester
    A tester class to test static method Quadruple.divide(Quadruple op1, Quadruple op2).
    SpecificTesterClasses.StaticMultiplicationTester
    A tester class to test static method Quadruple.multiply(Quadruple op1, Quadruple op2).
    SpecificTesterClasses.StaticSqrtTester
    A tester class to test Quadruple.sqrt(Quadruple).
    SpecificTesterClasses.StaticSubtractionTester
    A tester class to test static method Quadruple.subtract(Quadruple op1, Quadruple op2).
    SpecificTesterClasses.StringToQuadTester
    A tester class to test the conversion from String to Quadruple, namely the Quadruple.Quadruple(String) constructor.
    TestData
    Data sets for testing substantial public methods of Quadruple.
    TesterClasses
    The "Tester classes" are the classes that perform testing of individual types of operations on Quadruple, such as addition, division, or conversion from Quadruple to another numeric type.
    TesterClasses.BinaryFunctionTester
    An abstract tester class whose descendants perform testing of binary operations with Quadruples, such as Quadruple.add(Quadruple, Quadruple) or Quadruple.divide(Quadruple, Quadruple).
    TesterClasses.Conversion_Q2T_Tester<R>
    An abstract tester class whose descendants perform testing of conversions from Quadruple to other types, like Quadruple.toString() or Quadruple.doubleValue().
    TesterClasses.Conversion_T2Q_Tester<S>
    An abstract tester class whose descendants perform testing of conversions from other types to Quadruple, like Quadruple.Quadruple(String) or Quadruple.Quadruple(double).
    TesterClasses.QuadTester
    Common ancestor for all tester classes.
    TesterClasses.UnaryFunctionTester<S,R>
    A common ancestor of the tester classes that test conversions and unary operations, like Quadruple.toString() or Quadruple.sqrt(Quadruple).
    TesterClasses.UnaryQuadrupleFunctionTester
    An abstract tester class whose descendants perform testing of unary operations with Quadruple.
    TestResults
    A device for collecting statistics on test errors and displaying the results of the performed tests.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TesterClasses.Verbosity
    An enumeration of possible levels of the verbosity of the output.

Package com.mvohm.quadruple.test Description

A test appliance for methods of the Quadruple class. The tests are performed with the specific tester classes that are descendants of the class QuadTester, each operation is tested with a special descendant. The generic abstract tester classes are defined in the TesterClasses.java, their specific descendants in the SpecificTesterClasses.java. The test is performed by the method test() of a tester class. It obtains a list of test data samples using one of the static methods of the DataProviders class, then, iterating over the data samples, executes the tested operation with each data item, calculates or obtains from the data sample the expected result of the operation, creates DataItems containing source data and the expected result, and registers the result, passing the DataItems to an instance of the TestResults class, that computes and accumulates statistics on test results, such as mean relative error, MSE etc. After the test is finished, these values can be obtained via respective getters or printed to the console. The QuadTest class contains a main() method that executes all the tests autonomously. The QuadJUnitTests contains JUnit test methods. Includes classes:
  • AuxMethods -- auxiliary static methods used by other classes of the package
  • Consts -- constants used by the other classes
  • DataGenerators -- static methods to generate sequences of test data with certain properties
  • DataItem -- a container for data pertaining to a test
  • DataProviders -- a set of static methods that generate and collect data sets for specific operations
  • QuadJUnitTests -- a set of test methods to be used with JUnit
  • QuadTest -- an autonomous executor of all the tests
  • SpecificTesterClasses -- concrete descendants of the QuadTester class, each for a specific quadruple operation
  • TestData -- Arrays of statically-defined (hardcoded) test data
  • TesterClasses -- a hierarchy of abstract ancestors of the tester classes
  • TestResults -- a container capable to accumulate the statistics on the results of the tests
Author:
M.Vokhmentsev
